name: .BFLY
summary: Learn about .BFLY files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open BFLY files with Linwood Butterfly (cross-platform). To open a BFLY file with the app, select the + symbol (Create) from the Home screen and choose Import.
Linwood Butterfly can convert BFLY files to various file types, including the following formats:

images.alt: Screenshot of a .bfly file in Linwood Butterfly 2
images.caption: BFLY file open in Linwood Butterfly 2
